column4: hello, anyone knows if its possible to run the musicbrainz music tagger from terminal?
i did use it briefly and iirc it was a GUI app only... but things may have changed/my memory may be fuzzy
yes, it is a gui app as far as I know
http://wiki.musicbrainz.org/MusicBrainzEnabledApplications <-- take a look at that, beets may suit your purpose
